pages.description: I always wanted to become an Architect so I studied in Stellenbosch and passed my national and international qualifications, realizing it's not what I wanted to do, I built up experience in construction to learn the different aspects of building, and that's where passion and hard work got together to become a Commercial Property Broker, not to only sell a client a home but an investment for my client's business and hard work.
pages.name: page1
pages.title: I'm Charles Leedo
